messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] Can someone link me?
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 6/23/2003 11:50:43 PM Eastern Daylight Time, ... Was it possibly something about learning a part for girl scouts or something similar?  I
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 6/23/2003 11:50:43 PM Eastern Daylight Time,
SandraDodd@... writes:

> Recently Sandra posted an essay/article about the benefits that Holly
>
> had from being a late reader. It was about her theater experiences?
>
> I'd love to have that again, if possible. >>
>
> I should put that on the reading page, if anyone finds it.
>

Was it possibly something about learning a part for girl scouts or something
similar? I remember reading about her having to actually learn her part not
just read it off a piece of paper like the other kids did.

glena


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]

messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] well, I can narrow down the search...was	"Link me..."
messages.msgSnippet: ... I bet Sandra said Holly was in a play. Maybe try Holly memorize read. Or even Holly play. Joyce

messages.messageBody:

I've been clicking like mad, in a search with your name, Sandra

LOL whew! but narrowing it down with the words "holly, reading,
theater" added gets me NOTHING.

I started posting here in mid-April, near as I can remember. So,
narrowing it down to the Sandra Dodd posts from April ??? up to about
three weeks ago? *whimper*

maybe i'll find it. Abbie needs the computer now to work on her book.

we need another computer, is what!

HeidiC
